columns.ID: The unique identifier for each grape entry.
columns.Grape: The name of the grape variety.
columns.Color: The color classification of the grape.

grapes.table_description: The table provides details about different grape varieties.

columns.No: The unique identifier for each appellation entry.
columns.Appelation: The name of the wine appellation.
columns.County: The county where the appellation is located.
columns.State: The state where the appellation is situated.
columns.Area: The specific area classification of the appellation.
columns.isAVA: The indicator if the appellation is an American Viticultural Area.

appellations.table_description: The table details various wine appellations in different locations.

columns.No: The unique identifier for each wine entry.
columns.Grape: The grape variety used for producing the wine.
columns.Winery: The name of the winery that produces the wine.
columns.Appelation: The appellation where the wine is sourced.
columns.State: The state where the wine is produced.
columns.Name: The name designation of the wine.
columns.Year: The vintage year when the wine was produced.
columns.Price: The retail price of the wine in dollars.
columns.Score: The rating score assigned to the wine.
columns.Cases: The number of cases available for sale.
columns.Drink: The recommended time frame for drinking the wine.

wine.table_description: The table provides details about various wines including origins and characteristics.
